source.57b37557:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# Anchor extraction from HTML document
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from urllib.request import urlopen
url = 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beautiful_Soup_(HTML_parser)'
with urlopen(url) as response:
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response, 'html.parser')
    for anchor in soup.find_all('a'):
        print(anchor.get('href', '/'))
source.c571b2db: Python package [beautifulsoup](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beautiful_Soup_(HTML_parser)) is excellent for web scraping tasks and can be used to populate pandas data objects.
